tool_description: Simple API to get the latest, most current trending hashtags in US News.
name: Trending in News
title: Trending in News

api_list.name: Trending Hashtags Summaries
api_list.description:
Get the latest **trending hashtags** from US News.

Contains a **summary report** as well as its sources analyzed by trndgtr.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Number of summary reports to return.

api_list.name: Trending Hashtags
api_list.description: Get the latest **trending hashtags** from US News.
